changeSet.author: pwadmore
changeSet.sql: IF OBJECT_ID('${fffsWebPortalStagingDbReportingSchema}.FLUVIAL_FORECAST_LOCATION_JOB', 'U') IS NOT NULL EXEC sp_rename '${fffsWebPortalStagingDbReportingSchema}.FLUVIAL_FORECAST_LOCATION_JOB', 'DATETIME2_FLUVIAL_FORECAST_LOCATION_JOB';

rollback.sql: IF OBJECT_ID('${fffsWebPortalStagingDbReportingSchema}.DATETIME2_FLUVIAL_FORECAST_LOCATION_JOB', 'U') IS NOT NULL EXEC sp_rename '${fffsWebPortalStagingDbReportingSchema}.DATETIME2_FLUVIAL_FORECAST_LOCATION_JOB', 'FLUVIAL_FORECAST_LOCATION_JOB';
